title: nin aruL
sahitya:
nin aruL.  rAgA: kAmavardhini.  tALA: rUpaka  nin aruL iyambalAgumO O dEvA dEvA


anupallavi

  ponni nAthan pUvil vandOn pOTrum kamalap-pUnkazhalOi
mannum Agama maraigaL pugazha mATTA azhal nATTamuDaiyOi


caraNam 1    innal kUTTi inbamUTTi indrajAla viddai kATTi
tannai nambinOrai vITTil sadAnanda muzhuk-kATTum
  caraNam 2    aruLillAmal rAmadAsan tuyarurAmal magizhvadEdu
aruLillAmal pugazh shirandu akhila mIdu vAzhvadEdu
